articles.title: `Will be catastrophic for Indian football`: Skipper Sunil Chhetri on potential FIFA ban on Team India - WION

articles.content: Indian football team captain Sunil Chhetri believes a ban from FIFA will be catastrophic for Indian football. Chhetri said it will be disastrous not just for the whole country but also for him as he … [+2586 chars]
